solution_line_template: They'll celebrate their {years_married}th wedding anniversary in {anniversary_year} which means they got married in {anniversary_year}-{years_married} = <<{anniversary_year}-{years_married}={marriage_year}>>{marriage_year}
They started dating {years_dating_before_marriage} years before they got married in {marriage_year} which means they started dating in {marriage_year}-{years_dating_before_marriage} = {dating_year}
And they met {years_met_before_dating} years before they started dating which means they met in {dating_year}-{years_met_before_dating} = {met_year}
